New Records: Rohit Sharma broke the fastest World Cup century record with 131 off 63 balls.
Rohit Sharma became the leading six-hitter in international cricket, surpassing Chris Gayle.
Rohit Sharma reached 1000 runs in World Cups in his 19th match.
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma was dismissed for 131, with India still winning comfortably.
Virat Kohli finished the match with a four to send the crowd into raptures.
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan won the toss and decided to bat first.
Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of a good start and absorbing pressure.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's performance and resilience.
Hashmatullah Shahidi reflected on the loss and looked forward to future games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Delhi, with Rohit Sharma's performance being a highlight.
The article noted the efficient win by India with 15 overs to spare.
